issue.title: [Java] flatc is not used in mvn
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12419](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12419). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-12111 removed the usage of flatc during the build process in mvn. Thus, it is not necessary to explicitly download flatc for s390x.
